name: Multiplication table for kids. Free math game!
description: Multiplication table learning for kids, the game is completely free 2019 Different game modes: exam, mini test, selective study of numbers, passing through levels, duels Suitable for young children, as well as helping students quickly learn the multiplication table! - Free game math for kids and adult. Challenge 10x10.Times. Duel  We learn the Multiplication table for kids and adults. Examples are simple from 1 to 9 and complex from 10 to 15. Verification. Statistics. In Russian + with sound. Math will now be easy for you!  Multiplication table for kids - to study in our game is very simple, first go through the levels, then selectively pump the necessary numbers and beat world records!   + Simple interface + Different difficulty levels from 1 to 10, 2 to 9, 1 to 15 + Scatter mode  There is a training mode, as well as passing through the levels from 1 to 15.  There is a mode to learn certain numbers. Lets choose 2 and 4, learn weak numbers.  Thanks to the multiplication table game is easy to learn, some children even learned in 5 minutes.  We will also add a mode for two soon, together it will be more fun to play.  Suitable for pupils of 2 and 3 classes and 4 classes.  No internet required, Free game 2020. No answers or hints.
